reviews.review:
Jogo realmente bom, com mecânicas muito boa e divertida.
Único ponto que eu posso apontar no momento é que existe muito preconceito racismo e falta de respeito e o serviço do jogo raramente detecta pessoas que fazem tal coisa.
A comunidade é um pouco tóxica mas o jogo em si é íncrivel
Nice but still need to improve about the anti cheat

Мне нравится эта игра с большой историей.

Я не один так считаю ?

Counter Strike: Global Offensive is a pretty intense FP-Shooter, it has a large community with many new and unaware players, but also a large elderly community. As a beginner you should definitly invest into a prime status upgrade (if you take it seriosly). The game sadly has many cheaters in the nonprime section and is nearly unplayable, if you have a little competitiv mindset. The game is not really casual friendly so try it out, but if you want to get good you will have to invest some time and play frequently.

pros:
- big community
- more or less good game support by valve
- great external platforms for advanced players (faceit/esea etc.)
- simple but good gamedesign (no new cartoon shit)
- personalisation of the IngameUI is pretty good if you use the console
- many communtymaps (for fungames like hide and seek and TTT, aimimprovement and settingmanagement(very usefull if ur not familiar with commands), and communtymaps for scrimms)
- communityservers for warmup, FFA DM, Pistoltraining, Bhop, AWP-Training, Surf etc.

cons:
- unplayable without primeStatus
- many cheaters/bad anticheat
- toxic players on all elos (premate teams are usefull)
- high time invest necassary till youm can compete in Matchmaking

GLHF, Akenoooo

2020: Game is still very addictive, community still toxic and I still cant stop playing it. CSGO seems to be the best Shooter on PC you can actually get.
